title: ERROR sync: Failed to handle p2p pubsub error=attestation is not aggregated
body:
üíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíéüíé-->

# üêû Bug Report

I keep getting the following error message on Schlesi testnet:

```
[2020-04-27 13:59:56] ERROR sync: Failed to handle p2p pubsub error=attestation is not aggregated
```

### Description

Schlesi is a multi-client testnet between Lighthouse and Prysm. I keep seeing the following on the beacon chain node:

```
[2020-04-27 13:59:36]  INFO blockchain: Executing state transition on block root=0x37c075cb... slot=598
[2020-04-27 13:59:36]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=0 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 proposerSlashings=0 slot=598 voluntaryExits=0
[2020-04-27 13:59:48]  INFO blockchain: Executing state transition on block root=0x97510568... slot=599
[2020-04-27 13:59:48]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=0 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 proposerSlashings=0 slot=599 voluntaryExits=0
[2020-04-27 13:59:56] ERROR sync: Failed to handle p2p pubsub error=attestation is not aggregated
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/operations/attestations/kv.(*AttCaches).SaveAggregatedAttestation
        beacon-chain/operations/attestations/kv/aggregated.go:74
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).beaconAggregateProofSubscriber
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber_beacon_aggregate_proof.go:25
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).subscribeWithBase.func1
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber.go:166
runtime.goexit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1373 topic=/eth2/9925efd6/beacon_aggregate_and_proof/ssz_snappy
[2020-04-27 14:00:00]  INFO blockchain: Executing state transition on block root=0x7190ab58... slot=600
[2020-04-27 14:00:00]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=1 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 proposerSlashings=0 slot=600 voluntaryExits=0
```

And I also see this on the validator client, I'm unsure however, this is related:

```
[2020-04-27 13:55:12]  INFO validator: Proposal schedule pubKey=0xad80463d7591 slot=593
[2020-04-27 13:55:12]  INFO validator: Proposal schedule pubKey=0xad80463d7591 slot=595
[2020-04-27 13:55:12]  INFO validator: Proposal schedule pubKey=0xad80463d7591 slot=597
[2020-04-27 13:55:12]  INFO validator: Proposal schedule pubKey=0xad80463d7591 slot=601
[2020-04-27 13:55:12]  INFO validator: Proposal schedule pubKey=0xab629f8ce4ce slot=603
[2020-04-27 13:55:12]  INFO validator: Proposal schedule pubKey=0xab629f8ce4ce slot=605
[2020-04-27 13:55:12]  INFO validator: Proposal schedule pubKey=0xad80463d7591 slot=606
[2020-04-27 13:55:12]  INFO validator: Attestation schedule attesters=1 pubKeys=[0xad80463d7591] slot=607
[2020-04-27 13:55:12]  INFO validator: Submitted new block blockRoot=0x798c7b5f1ccf numAttestations=1 numDeposits=0 pubKey=0xad80463d7591 slot=576
[2020-04-27 13:55:48]  INFO validator: Submitted new block blockRoot=0x35da4e8e88f7 numAttestations=0 numDeposits=0 pubKey=0xad80463d7591 slot=579
[2020-04-27 13:56:00]  INFO validator: Submitted new block blockRoot=0xe2de5b39178c numAttestations=0 numDeposits=0 pubKey=0xab629f8ce4ce slot=580
[2020-04-27 13:57:24]  INFO validator: Submitted new block blockRoot=0x372ea7d85b13 numAttestations=0 numDeposits=0 pubKey=0xab629f8ce4ce slot=587
[2020-04-27 13:58:20] ERROR validator: Could not submit slot signature to beacon node: rpc error: code = Internal desc = No aggregated attestation in beacon node slot=591
[2020-04-27 13:58:20]  INFO validator: Submitted new attestations AggregatorIndices=[] AttesterIndices=[3] BeaconBlockRoot=0x190dbbc5d9e6 CommitteeIndex=0 Slot=591 SourceEpoch=12 SourceRoot=0x2add178b8721 TargetEpoch=18 TargetRoot=0x798c7b5f1ccf
[2020-04-27 13:58:36]  INFO validator: Submitted new block blockRoot=0x5bddc2e4fef2 numAttestations=1 numDeposits=0 pubKey=0xad80463d7591 slot=593
[2020-04-27 13:59:00]  INFO validator: Submitted new block blockRoot=0x7e26860b9264 numAttestations=0 numDeposits=0 pubKey=0xad80463d7591 slot=595
[2020-04-27 13:59:24]  INFO validator: Submitted new block blockRoot=0xd92d2dface22 numAttestations=0 numDeposits=0 pubKey=0xad80463d7591 slot=597
```

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

N/A

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

1. Connect to schlesi testnet (for the first error message on the beacon chain node)
2. Create validator deposit and run a validator (for the second error message on the validator)

## üî• Error

See above...

## üåç  Your Environment

**Operating System:**

Arch Linux with Bazel.

**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)**

Running the v0.12 branch with the consensus fix @

**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?**

Test out the Schlesi config yourself: https://github.com/goerli/schlesi/
Very similar to #5623. Bumping up the priority for this one

Similar issue on raspi4 4gb, ubuntu 19 arm64, on prysm testnet, beacon-chainv1.0.6

```[2020-05-04 08:39:01]  WARN powchain: Subscription to new head notifier failed error=websocket: close 1006 (abnormal closure): unexpected EOF
[2020-05-04 08:39:02]  INFO powchain: Connected to eth1 proof-of-work chain endpoint=wss://goerli.prylabs.net/websocket
[2020-05-04 08:39:44] ERROR sync: Failed to handle p2p pubsub error=context deadline exceeded
could not save new justified
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).onBlock
        beacon-chain/blockchain/process_block.go:147
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).ReceiveBlockNoPubsub
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_block.go:73
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).beaconBlockSubscriber
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber_beacon_blocks.go:38
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).subscribeWithBase.func1
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber.go:166
runtime.goexit
        src/runtime/asm_arm64.s:1148
could not process block
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).ReceiveBlockNoPubsub
        beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_block.go:75
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).beaconBlockSubscriber
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber_beacon_blocks.go:38
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).subscribeWithBase.func1
        beacon-chain/sync/subscriber.go:166
runtime.goexit
        src/runtime/asm_arm64.s:1148 topic=/eth2/f071c66c/beacon_block/ssz_snappy
[2020-05-04 08:39:47]  INFO blockchain: Executing state transition on block root=0x30845260... slot=117798
Killed

I also encounter a similar issue on RasberryPi4, Ubuntu20.04 ARM64, Topaz Testnet, Beacon-chain1.0.6:
```May 12 09:43:28 ethnode-c35bf434b beacon-chain[1457]: time="2020-05-12 09:43:28" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=38 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain proposerSlashings=0 voluntaryExits=0
May 12 09:43:34 ethnode-c35bf434b beacon-chain[1457]: time="2020-05-12 09:43:34" level=warning msg="eth1 client is not syncing" prefix=powchain
May 12 09:43:35 ethnode-c35bf434b beacon-chain[1457]: time="2020-05-12 09:43:35" level=error msg="Failed to write to stream" error="stream reset" handler=status prefix=sync
May 12 09:43:35 ethnode-c35bf434b beacon-chain[1457]: time="2020-05-12 09:43:35" level=warning msg="Failed to handle p2p RPC" error="stream reset" peer=16Uiu2HAkzsmXA5JkMGbYTLWUPVizdhfEWN4TZp8kFWa5XwCuWYR6 prefix=sync topic="/eth2/beacon_chain/req/status/1/ssz_snappy"
May 12 09:43:39 ethnode-c35bf434b validator[1647]: time="2020-05-12 09:43:39" level=error msg="Could not submit slot signature to beacon node: rpc error: code = Internal desc = No aggregated attestation in beacon node" prefix=validator slot=175746
May 12 09:43:39 ethnode-c35bf434b validator[1647]: time="2020-05-12 09:43:39" level=info msg="Submitted new attestations" AggregatorIndices=[] AttesterIndices=[28987] BeaconBlockRoot=0xf9fb70553eb2 CommitteeIndex=5 Slot=175746 SourceEpoch=5490 SourceRoot=0xddd9a0571835 TargetEpoch=5492 TargetRoot=0xf9fb70553eb2 prefix=validator
May 12 09:43:41 ethnode-c35bf434b beacon-chain[1457]: time="2020-05-12 09:43:41" level=info msg="Synced new block" block=0x25bfbaf0... epoch=5491 finalizedEpoch=5489 finalizedRoot=0x2f14fba5... prefix=blockchain slot=175718
```
Same error on witti (Ubuntu 18.04, setup follow https://medium.com/@SomerEsat/guide-to-staking-on-ethereum-2-0-ubuntu-prysm-witti-2b972e697918 )
